description: Friendly and outgoing, loves to play and be around people.
Calm and courageous, enjoys lounging and being a loyal companion.
Intelligent and active, loves to learn new tricks and play fetch.
Affectionate and gentle, great with kids and loves outdoor activities.
Curious and friendly, enjoys exploring and being part of a pack.
Playful and brave, has a big personality in a small body.
Energetic and playful, loves to be active and make new friends.
